other_tests.findings: Positive for influenza A virus by DFA, viral culture, and PCR, identified as 2009 A(H1N1) virus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial BAL specimen on day 3 yielded a negative DFA and positive PCR. Subsequent endotracheal and BAL specimens continued to show positive results until day 25, with the final BAL specimen on day 24 yielding a negative result.

other_tests.findings: Negative for DFA, positive for PCR.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up nasopharyngeal specimen obtained on day 4 had negative culture and PCR results. All subsequent nasopharyngeal specimens collected during the hospitalization had negative results.
Endotracheal specimens continued to have positive results by PCR until day 25.
